label: 大日本王代記
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
見出し読み: だいにほんおうだいき
見出し読み_mod: だいにほんおうだいき
説明文: a chronological account of the first 113 Japanese emperors, beginning with Jimmu Tennō, by Yoshida Mitsuyoshi (1598-1672), first published in 1649 [神武天皇、吉田光由]
